editor_preview.TextRaw: To have faith is to trust yourself to the water
editor_preview.HyperText:
Jules: No no, Mr. Wolfe, it's not like that. Your help is definitely appreciated.

Vincent: Look, Mr. Wolfe, I respect you. I just don't like people barking orders at me, that's all.

The Wolf: If I'm curt with you, it's because time is a factor. I think fast, I talk fast, and I need you two guys to act fast if you want to get out of this. So pretty please, with sugar on top, clean the car.
editor_preview.$longText: Opossums are frequently considered to be living fossils, and as a result are often used to approximate the ancestral therian condition in comparative studies. However, this is inaccurate, the oldest opossum fossils are early Miocene in age (roughly 20 million years old) and the last common ancestor of all living opossums approximately dates to the Oligocene-Miocene boundary (roughly 23 million years ago) and is at most no older than Oligocene in age. Many extinct metatherians once considered early opossums, such as Alphadon, Peradectes, Herpetotherium, and Pucadelphys, have since been recognized to have been previously grouped with opossums on the basis of plesiomorphies and are now considered to represent older branches of Metatheria only distantly related to modern opossums.
editor_preview.$corefText: I voted for Obama because he was most aligned with my values, she said.

$humanMachineDialogue.author: Robot
$humanMachineDialogue.text: Nice to meet you, man! Tell me what you want.

$humanMachineDialogue.author: Human
$humanMachineDialogue.text: Order me a pizza from Golden Boy at Green Street

$humanMachineDialogue.author: Robot
$humanMachineDialogue.text: Done. When do you want to get the order?

editor_preview.$resptwo: Sorry, it's too early. May be we can change the time?
editor_preview.$respthree: Don't eat junk food man, it's bad for you...
editor_preview.$ner: A Florida restaurant paid 10,925 pounds ($16,935) for the draft of \"Ain't no telling\", which Hendrix penned on a piece of London hotel stationery in late 1966.
editor_preview.$pairText1: Look at this! It's a brand new product
editor_preview.$pairText2: Look at this! It's an awesome piece of sh*t

upload.$longText: Opossums are frequently considered to be living fossils, and as a result are often used to approximate the ancestral therian condition in comparative studies. However, this is inaccurate, the oldest opossum fossils are early Miocene in age (roughly 20 million years old) and the last common ancestor of all living opossums approximately dates to the Oligocene-Miocene boundary (roughly 23 million years ago) and is at most no older than Oligocene in age. Many extinct metatherians once considered early opossums, such as Alphadon, Peradectes, Herpetotherium, and Pucadelphys, have since been recognized to have been previously grouped with opossums on the basis of plesiomorphies and are now considered to represent older branches of Metatheria only distantly related to modern opossums.
